Which Guild was he sent to..?
11123111111111111111112.title: 'Rescued' And Sent By Minerva...

choices: He Accidentally Comes Across His Next Opponent...
He Attempts To Fins And Negotiate Something With Mavis...
He Seeks Help From One Of The Originally Hesitant Members, Wendy, Mira or Levy..
111231111111111111112.content:
Natsu, who was once again small, suddenly had a feeling deep in his gut. A feeling that stated that if he didn't leave now, he would once again be forced to interact with someone's foot. Though with his current state of things, no matter what he did or where he went, he was bound to get get involved with them.

However, he jumped to his feet when he heard the thudding sound of heavy steps walking in his direction. He was right. After all these years, smelling and absorbing the various types and intensity of smells from different girls, had he developed some kind of strange sense that allowed him to feel when feet were nearby?

Unlikely.

He possibly just unconsciously heard the thuds that were building sound with each step. Natsu looked around the room, for an escape, but a few inches in height, there were very limited options. And the most viable one was, the window, and since it was open, he immediately used his hands to create a burst of flames that allowed him to make the jump. And once more, to lessen the blow of landing, though it admittedly wouldn't be anything in comparison to the trampling he had experienced.

Bracing himself, regardless of his self-assurance, he glared at the ground as he brought himself down as though he were floating. From up above, he could hear to voices, one was indefinitely a frustrated Erza, and the other sounded like Lucy. He didn't know why she was there, but he didn't have time to deal with that.

He needed to decide what he was going to do...
111231111111111111112.title: A Sixth Sense For feet...

choices: He Was Somehow Victorious, Despite His Everlasting Smell...
He Suffered A Brutal Defeat At Their Feet...
Regardless Of The Outcome, His Guild Punishes Him For Being So Late...
11123111111111111112.content:
With a sudden burst of energy, sold through his determination, Natsu summoned a fierce fire to the palms of his still moving hands. The heat was more intense than what she had stomped out before, so she responded by lifting her foot, allowing Natsu took the opportunity to break the back of her shoe, opening a hole that could free him.

There was no way in Hell that he would lose like this. If he was going to lose, it wouldn't be by default. He used the flames at his hands to speed himself up as he ran through, narrowly dodging the booted foot of an annoyed Angel.

'3...2...' He heard the numbers drop, he was almost there... '1...' And with another sudden burst of energy, he took a mighty jump at the last second. '0..!' He had made it, if just barely.

"What do you know! This miniature living foot rag has made it on time after all!" Both Cheria and Millianna gave a pleased grin. It would have been too boring if he had simply lost by default, they wanted to experience what he felt like underfoot as well, after all.

He noticed his guild members various expressions, some of joy, some in thought, and in particular, the blatantly annoyed expression that Erza was sending his direction.

"Now, Mister Natsu, if you would please take your spot on the opposite side of the arena!" The announcers voice sounded as though it could peace the heavens, more so to his tiny ears, but he did as he was told, his eyes slanted into the glare he had been known for before this whole Foot Hell started.

Though naturally, it didn't have much impact as his two opponents continued to smirk in his direction, preemptively sliding their individual kinds of footwear, exposing their wretched bare feet to his slightly wavering gaze. It felt really humiliating to falter at the mere sight of a female's foot.

And soon, the countdown signaling their match started. He swallowed deeply, both hearing and feeling the many different things coming from his Guild's group.

'5...' But he couldn't lose, he had to win all of this... '4...' Otherwise he would be put in a position somehow worse than he had been before, if Mavis was to be believed, that is... '3...' That is, if she were to keep her promise in the first place. He had grown very distrusting of Female's as of late, and the fact that she didn't wear shoes in the first place kept him on guard. '2...' But no matter the case, even if she were lying, if he didn't win, then he would be smothered, trampled, and everything else. '1...' So win or lose, he just had to do what he could. '0..!'

And now it was time to fight, for the sake of a better tomorrow!

(The fight itself can be described as well, but...) What was the outcome of the fight?
11123111111111111112.title: A Sudden Appearance...

choices: Send Him Back To Attempt His Contract...
Play With Him Herself A Bit Longer, Causing Him To Lose The First Match...
Send Him In Front Of His Female Guild Mates, Big or Small...
111231111111111112.content:
Only moments after he reunited with everyone, he found himself covered in light and in the exact same space that he had just been speaking to Mavis. He turned around, and found that she was massive, just as he had been witnessing in several respects for a little over seven years. 'Please, no...' Was his only thought, but given that she could read his mind whilst in this space, she only gave a bright smile in response.

"I'm afraid so Natsu... I must admit that I'm also rather curious about what torturing you underfoot is like." She lifts her bare sole, sweat dripping from all over above his face, allowing it to drop on him, "And don't worry, since this is my space, I can make this as bad or as good as possible for you. Who knows, maybe you'll even learn to like them!" Both he and she knew that unless he went insane, or she used some kind of magic on him, that would never happen. And what did she mean, 'Don't worry'? She just told him that if she wanted to, this could somehow be the worst experience yet.

He stared upwards at the sole looming over him, and soon after acknowledging it again, he heard her give a small laugh, which apparently signaled the first attack. Her wet foot slammed on top of him, causing him to immediately stick to it. His face was forced directly in between her toes, and as she begins to grind him into the bright floor below him, he is forced to eat the naturally made 'jam' in between her toes.

As he should have expected, the moment he laps it up, it immediately reappears, causing him to repeat the process as he hears the guilds' first master moaning in some kind of pleasure up above. The one thing he hadn't expected was both the taste and the smell... To his surprise, it had both a sweet flavor and fragrance, as though he was eating the produce in the middle of a strawberry field. Somehow, it could actually be described as a proper kind of jam.

He felt tears come from his eyes as the first good smell in years entered his nose... If this was what she meant, then maybe he could learn to like this kind of thing. Now acting unconsciously, he begins to lick the in betweens of her toes at a faster, and more excited rate, taking large whiffs along the way.

However those tears that were born of pleasure and satisfaction, was soon met with tears of despair as the 'strawberry' like substance he had been willingly eating, suddenly began to taste like they were rotting, and the smell turned sour. He kept licking, albeit it slowed as he realized that his sanctuary in his foot-filled hell was suddenly gone.

His eyes darted upwards as he heard an amused giggle, coming from his current captor, now remembering that she was grinding him from the neck down deeper into her foot. "Silly bug, surely you didn't think I would let it off at that, right?" He should have called this, both between being called a bug again and having his day continuously ruined. "It was amusing, watching you lick away, as though you were a starving dog... But it's more enjoyable to watch you suffer after all."

She closed her toes around his skull, squishing it in the process, but within a matter of moments, it returned to its original shape. She could truly do whatever she wanted in here, and all of a sudden, the entire room began to smell like in enhanced version of what he experienced for the past seven years. Somehow more intense than eighteen pairs of feet, with girls that intentionally tried to make their feet smell worse. Mavis however, was unaffected, meaning that she was only projecting this on to his psyche.

"Don't worry, Natsu... Our contract still stands, but after feeling this, now I can't help but want you to fail..." She licked her lips teasingly, thinking about how he would feel as a permanent insole... Though she didn't wear shoes, so she would need something else.

"Well Natsu, sadly I'm afraid our time must end... However..." As she said that, she used the toes of her other foot to peel him off, and once he lied in front of her, motionless, she lifted her foot above him once more. And pointed her toes at him, jabbing them into him soon after. He felt as though his entire body had been pierced, but when she lifted her foot again, there was no damage, as usual, but on the tip of her large toe was something shiny. Had she taken something from him.

She giggled slightly, once again as the light began to move, settling itself into the toe jam that he had been licking earlier. "That, Natsu... Was a part of your soul. A part of you, yourself, is now infused within the goop between my toes. You can feel it, taste it, smell it at all given times, I can watch as you struggle during the fights as I effortlessly squeeze a part of yourself between them." Her smile widened even more, before speaking again, "And not only that... I decided to make this fun for you, whilst enjoying your suffering at the same time. The part of your soul I took, was the part that hated feet the most." His eyes widened as his body came to a halt.

This meant that the part of him that hated this situation the most, was the part that would be stuck as goop between her toes, meaning there would always be experiencing a small, condensed Hell, possibly worse than anything he has done thus far. And not only that, but if the part of him that hated feet was gone, how would things go during the games, that were bound to go poorly in some way or another, undoubtedly due to Erza.

"I must thank Erza at some point, to thank her for starting such a thing. Though, maybe I should thank whatever it is that shrunk you... But in any case, Natsu, I hope you enjoy your time permanently underfoot. Try to win if you don't want it to happen anymore, though I still hope for your loss... In any case Natsu, it's time..."

After all that has happened, it was time to start something more, what was about to happen?
111231111111111112.title: Mavis Vs. Natsu

choices: Climb The Bed To Wendy's Feet And Risk Being Seen As 'The' Bug...
Attempt To Retrieve His Other Half, And Risk Being Stuck Once Again...
Fail At Both And Pass Out, Back Into The Shoe That He Had Been Sitting On...
111231111112.content:
Natsu, was in Wendy's shoe, and just as she had told Erza, the smell was hellishly bad. It was as if she had warn these shoes since she was a baby, and went without washing either them or her feet ever since the first time. He wanted to gag, but he couldn't quite move yet...

Or so he thought. His new gum like body, due to not being constantly crushed as of this moment, for the first time in week, had finally begun to free itself. And after much pain and many popping muscles, which he probably shouldn't have anymore, his body returned to it's former human shape... Although it was only half of what it was when he had first been shrunk.

That made sense, after all his body had split in to... Meaning that even if he was free here, he would still feel all of the intensity that Wendy's shoes had to offer, from smell, taste and feeling, though it was admittedly at half it's original potency, which was considerably more tolerable than before... And it would probably be even better when he actually got out of her shoe.

The main concern now would be if Erza found out what had happened. The moment any smell catches her nose, she will realize something since he was supposed to be absorbing it, sweat and all. She was sure to be surprised, since almost a month had passed without any incident, but that was too bad. If he could help it, he sure as Hell wasn't going back.

He ran towards the back of Wendy's blue shoes, feeling the ever familiar 'squelching' noise underneath him. He had just barely managed to avoid slipping, and by extension, receiving yet another mouthful of sweat, before reaching his destination. His physical abilities had drastically lowered within the time that he was being crushed, but that just meant that he had to make up for it in determination!

Once there, he attempts to climb up the thin wall, and opting to sit on it to take a break once at the top. Seeing as he was in her room, if he wanted to get help from Wendy. The smell of her feet could kill, but she was a kind girl, who even when she only acknowledged him as a bug, still didn't want to hurt him. Despite any insistence from Erza, ranging from 'It's fine' or 'He actually enjoys it'.

And of course, the only way to reach her, was to work against his currently useless body and climb her bed. And he really didn't every want to recognize a pair of feet at any point in his life ever again, but despite the smell, her feet would probably be the best place to get her attention. However, there were risks, no matter the case aside from his own distaste. And the risks in question were, should she see him, she will either see him as Natsu, in which he would need to explain why he was there, both small and on her bed... Or she will see him as a bug, given where he will be, probably the infamous bug that Erza has been speaking of. And to add to it, she might even think that he was actively searching for her feet and 'assist' him, given her helpful personality.

And as for another option...

He could try and get to his other half, and connect himself entirely again. Since, even if he escaped, so long as half of his body was still an insole, he wouldn't really escape. Of course, succeeding in connecting again would mean that absolutely no smell would be blocked, he would still need to get someone, probably Wendy's help, and that would seal his fate in regards to Erza's awareness. And there was the added risk of, even if he reforms, there was no certainty that he would reform as his current walking half, and he would just become a one foot only insole again. So in a way, it was a high risk high reward situation, or he deals with feeling half of what he had been, and possibly try and get Wendy, should he manage to get her attention, to do something about it.

Until becoming an unknown slave at the feet of several girls, Natsu hadn't thought much about his actions. Now, he had to think through everything, lest his Hell continue. What shall he do?
111231111112.title: Possibilities From Within Wendy's Shoe.

choices: The Fuse Again And Attempt To Get Lucy's Help...
They've Reconnected And Leave The Room To Get Some Friendlier Help...
The Natsu's Actually Enjoyed Feet And Wanted To Continue With Erza's Plan...
111231112.content:
Normally, something like increased heat would have endangered anyone else in this position, but Natsu on the other hand thrived on it. It wasn't fire, so he couldn't reenergize himself, but at the very least it did keep him pumped up enough to fatten back out into his normal size. Well, normal thickness, in any case.

He began to struggle a bit, as he made his way to the top of the sock, though part way through, he ends up in a battle with Lucy's toes. They had pressed his head back down and in between her toes plenty of times, forcing him to drink sweat and eat the foul goop that was there. It immediately caused his gag reflexes to kick in, but he continued to push through. Somehow, the sweaty surface of the bottom of her foot actually helped, as he used it to slide in between the two troubling beings.

Natsu could feel the disgusting stuff attach itself to his body, but he didn't have time for that. Whilst he had this constantly diminishing energy, he needed to get out, before this ridiculous smell knocks him out... Or rather, he wished it would knock him out, that way, even if he was under the feet, he didn't have to experience it. Moments like these, he cursed his enhanced Dragon Slayer smelling...

After a few minutes of forcing his way through and sliding across the top of her foot, he had found something useful. At the top of it, there was a hole in this old sock. Which meant, one, her neighbors probably still weren't too pleased. And two, he had a better means of escape than forcing his way out through the mouth.

He needed to rip it open slightly, but within a few moments, he could exit the foul cloth cage. Once outside, he didn't even have the energy to move properly anymore, be it due to the happiness or something else. He fell to his knees, doing his damnedest to ignore the stench he had soaked up as well as the one behind him, but he was fighting a losing battle.

He crawled his way to the foot of her bed, still gasping for breath. If he hadn't known better, he would say that the foul air in her sock caused his hair to turn green. Brown, if nothing else... 115212221.content:
“Lady Brandish, I-I’ve finished!”

Pulling her drink away from her lips, Brandish glanced down at the table below. Her unoccupied hand sat there, resting ever so still atop the wooden surface. It’s nails, a dull green when she had first entered the guildhall, now glistened a bright jade like those of it’s occupied sibling. She lifted it up to better inspect the newly-applied coat, and slightly – slightly – her stony expression lifted at the results.

“Acceptable.” She muttered, and then cast her eyes down once again. With both hands in air, one carefully guarding her half-full glass and the other curled in presentation before her face, there should have been nothing left upon the table.

Yet there was something still: a tiny boy, barely the size of Brandish’s longest finger, looking back at her with a mixture of fear and pleading. In his shaky grasp was a brush of green nail polish; a normal-sized person could have easily held it between two fingers, but the boy required both arms to hold the sword-sized brush.

Her eyes drilled into him as she quietly awaited some kind of response. It was only after a short and uncomfortable silence that the boy’s wobbly lips opened. “Please, Bran- L-Lady Brandish! I’ve done what you wanted! Please turn me big again! T-This isn’t funny!”

Brandish’s face hardened, causing the minuscule figure to recoil the tiniest bit. “Funny?” Her voice reeked of contained irritation. “That little prank of yours wasn’t very funny.” She mused and pointed a giant finger towards bar – specifically, towards a certain stool. Atop that stool, sat a certain, fancy coat with a large and still somewhat smoldering bruise blemishing it’s golden beauty.

At the reminder, the boy sunk in remorse, and he recalled, with great regret, what had transpired…

---

“Hey, Rom~e~o~”

Romeo could easily smell the overwhelming scent of alcohol on Cana’s breath as she whispered into his ear. Far from anything unusual, he thought nothing of it at first.

“Yes, Cana-nee?” He replied, glancing over at the female next to him.

“You –” She hicked. Romeo’s eyebrows raised. When was last time Cana had gotten hiccups from drinking? He didn’t get anymore time to process that question however, as his guildmate wrapped an arm around him and pressed his face into her neck.

“– you can mix t’ose flames of yoursh together, right?” Cana slurred on, shooting him a big, tipsy grin.

He should really have started asking just how much was in her system to make her this way. Could it have been the new wine they had received from Alvarez? Perhaps Cana-nee’s body wasn’t used to it, like it was with all the alcohol normally served at the guild, and so had no resistance to it?

But his growing boy mind was thinking about of that. Instead, it had been overtaken by his current closeness to the drunken woman’s exposed and ample bosom. He couldn’t find the strength to pry his gaze away from that inciting abyss, even as his face threatened to explode from the heat building up within.

With dry lips, he managed out. “Y-yes, C-Cana-nee. I-I can.”

Her chest came forward as she leaned in closer, now leaving barely an inch between the tip of his nose and her soft flesh. From above him came another sloshy whisper. “Why don’t ya… mix the smelly one with the sticky one… and shlap it onto Lucy’s stool there, hm?”

Somehow, Romeo found to strength to glance up at her. “B-But, Cana-nee, that’s not-”

Cana’s lips puckered into a disappointed pout. “Come on, Romeo! It’ll be hilarious! Beshides, Nat –” Another hiccup, but this one she powered through. “Natsu pranks her all the time! You wanna be like Natsu, don’t ya?” Her face jutted closer, stopping when her lips dangled just out of reach of his. Her eyes ensnared his, and the fortitude he had found crumbled into dust beneath the pounding of his heart.

“Hows about it?” He could only just hear her over the thundering in his chest, but there’s was no missing the way her supple, juicy lips curled into a seductive smile. “Pretty pleash for Cana-nee?”

---

With a defeated sigh, Romeo’s eyes trailed away from the ruined article of clothing, and followed the bar till it reached it’s end. On the final stool, Cana, his temptress, sat slumped over the counter in an alcohol-fueled blackout. Seems she had passed out after Romeo had left to use the bathroom, mere moments before Brandish had entered the guildhall and taken the boobytrapped stool for herself.

So much for her promise of making sure only Lucy sat there…

Setting the nail brush down, he stood tall towards his giantess captor and called out with all his heart. “I said I was sorry! I meant to…” He fumbled for how exactly to explain, before deciding to do so later, and pressed on. “Please just turn me back to normal! I-I don’t like being this small!”

Nonchalantly, Brandish took another sip from her drink, sloshed it around on her tongue for a second, and then swallowed. “No.” Was her cold response, and with it, her free hand descended and clamped around him. “I’m not done repaying the favor yet.”
